title: I'm looking for a unicase san-serif font - can anyone help me?
content: I'm looking for a sans-serif typeface that is unicase. Can anyone suggest one?
author: gratibunda

comments.content:
Avant Garde Gothic Pro has some alternates that will give it a unicase look.  
Panoptica has a few sans styles too.

Captain Narrow?  
 [http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/fontry/cfb1-captain-narrow/normal/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415073503/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/fontry/cfb1-captain-narrow/normal/)

okay, maybe not...

~~~~~~~~~~~~

[_from the Fontry..._](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415073503/http:/www.thefontry.com/)
If you want a bold Futura-esque unicase, Ray Larabie's [Meloriac](http://web.archive.org/) brings it.

My own Hypatia Sans has unicase alternates.

[http://www.adobe.com/type/browser/landing/hypatia/hypatia.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415073503/http:/www.adobe.com/type/browser/landing/hypatia/hypatia.html "http://www.adobe.com/type/browser/landing/hypatia/hypatia.html")
